name: Share Your Word
description:
Everyone has the same encrypted text but YOUR game contains a unique word.

Share Your Word with the others (in the comment section) to complete the hidden text.

If all words are found, I will release a build revealing the secret of the game.

Words found : 0 out of 45

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(WASD to move, MOUSE to look around, E to interact)

(made for GMTK Game Jam 2019)

(music from Myers Music)
